survey_name: Customer Satisfaction with Electric Vehicle (EV) Charging Station Networks Survey
survey_brief: This survey aims to gather feedback from EV owners regarding their experiences and satisfaction levels with public EV charging station networks, including ease of use, reliability, and availability.

questions.question_text: How frequently do you use public EV charging stations?
questions.client_notes: Use a single-choice radio button for this question. Ensure the options are clear and cover all possible usage frequencies.

script.question_text: How frequently do you use public EV charging stations?

questions.question_text: Which of the following issues have you encountered while using public EV charging stations? (Select all that apply)
questions.client_notes: Use a multi-choice checkbox for this question. Ensure the options are clear and cover common issues.

script.question_text: Which of the following issues have you encountered while using public EV charging stations? (Select all that apply)

questions.question_text: How satisfied are you with the reliability of public EV charging stations?
questions.client_notes: Use a single-choice radio button for this question. Ensure the scale is clear and balanced.

script.question_text: How satisfied are you with the reliability of public EV charging stations?

questions.question_text: What improvements would you suggest for public EV charging station networks?
questions.client_notes: Use an open-text field for this question. Encourage detailed feedback.

script.question_text: What improvements would you suggest for public EV charging station networks?

questions.question_text: How likely are you to recommend your preferred EV charging network to others?
questions.client_notes: Use a single-choice radio button for this question. Ensure the scale is clear and balanced.

script.question_text: How likely are you to recommend your preferred EV charging network to others?
